text: Iteca Kazakhstan Exhibition Company is the leader in the Central Asian region in organising and holding b2b events. For over 30 years, a team of professionals has been organising truly business-friendly international industry exhibitions, large forums and conferences.

Each year, more than 25 expo events attract international business representatives from 55 countries, opening doors to the Kazakhstan market and expanding the geography of international partnerships in a variety of sectors, including: oil and gas, energy, mining and metallurgy, building, tourism, transport and logistics, food industry and agriculture, and medicine. Over 47,000 industry professionals from 80 countries visit our events annually.

Eleven exhibitions in Iteca's portfolio have been honoured with the «UFI Approved Event» mark from the Global Association of the Exhibition Industry (UFI), which demonstrates the high organisational level of the events and their influence on business development and industry shaping, and also confirms the reliability of statistics.
Official support for our events has traditionally been provided by the Government, relevant ministries and committees of the Republic of Kazakhstan, regional/city Akimats, and industry associations.
Iteca provides a full set of services in support of participation in exhibitions: exhibition area rental, stand set-up, technical equipment, and marketing promotion.
Iteca is a unique opportunity to develop your business in Kazakhstan.
